website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable two strap backpack that is comparable to other bags in quality, but at a much lower price point.
pros: Backpack is well-padded for added comfort
No shortage of compartments and pockets, as you will find a space for every hunting item you need
We thoroughly appreciated the insulated pocket designed to keep a hydration bladder cold
cons: The webbing on the sides is too narrow

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well constructed,well thought out design.
customer_reviews.text: This pack is a nice, solid, Well built backpack. I made very good use of it on a recent 34 mile hike in the woods. The padded back was comfortable,It held all my gear and the Molly system is very useful for holding additional items on the outside that you may not be able to fit on the inside of the pack or that you want to get to quickly.I had it stuffed very well and after the hike I inspected the entire pack and all the sewn in Anchor points and zippers were all in good condition with no signs of ripping thread or material separation.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack only 1 drawback for me
customer_reviews.text: One of the top backpacks on Amazon. I use this backpack for nearly all my outdoor trips, vacations or when i just need to pack a bunch of random things together (anyone say fishing trip?) My only drawback with this product is with the pocket for the water bladder. If the bladder is filled to its capacity the shape of the bladder effects the wearer to where its uncomfortable. I've had to fill up the bladder to a minimum for this. This seems like it would be a common problem but i guess one that people just deal with.
customer_reviews.author: brandon smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Bad Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag and was excited when I got it in the mail, everything seemed fine until I was ready to take it on a trip over the weekend. I realized that the insulated water bladder pocket was sewn wrong. Whoever made the bag sewed the backpack straps so close to the zipper near the top of the bag that the water bladder pouch will not completely zip shut. I'm very disappointed and hope that I can get some sort of replacement. Other than that the bag seems sturdy and has lots of pockets and places for hanging your gear.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Wouters

customer_reviews.title: Awesome every motorcycle rider needs one of these for long distance traveling.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this military tactical backpack hydration bag for the last three months and I am using it every time I go out on my motorcycle. It is incredible. Keeps water for as cold as your ice lasts and I would say that’s a good 24 hours at least. It is easy to fill and the bag rucksack itself is very roomy. If I had one complaint it would be that the bag is too roomy I would prefer a much more utilitarian style designed bag and I may have to buy another one to get it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wristen

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had for a long time to give a durablity review but the bag looks impressive. Have not tried to adjust to determine fit. Lots of pockets, nice adjustments, Molle straps, etc. One of the zippers is a little stiff. If I was going to camp in the wilderness for a month I would look for a better (and likely way more expensive) bag but for a nice item to put a first aide kit, some survival tools, etc for the trunk of my car for an emergency a nice bag!
customer_reviews.author: KTown

customer_reviews.title: great pack, sturdy and with a ton of storage!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever for the s/o at work in the summer. He does a lot of outdoor work and the bladder is huge in this thing!! It fits him great (plus size guy) and very comfortably. Plus it has a ton of storage, so I can pack him with sunscreen and snacks and everything else he could need! This will definitely double for our hiking and outdoor stuff too!!
customer_reviews.author: THein

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband’s new favorite backpack. Lots of pockets and it can hold a lot of things. I bought this backpack for his hunting trip coming up soon and he has already stuffed it with over 35 lbs of items that he will be taking. From wearing it around the house already he says it feels really comfortable. My husband is really excited to go hiking with his new bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jen O.

customer_reviews.title: Tough and secure!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe what a great backpack this is!! It has tons of details that make it worth twice what it cost. It's sturdy, has plenty of storage space, sewn beautifully including all the pouches and bands that hold your stuff securely, the material is thick and substantial yet not rough or coarse. I can't say enough about it. I ordered two more when I saw how well it was constructed!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Durable, and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used this to haul around a #20 egg, for a Tactical Event. Worked Great! Lots of Molle points. Only issue is the "Y" Strap (which actually works great) totally covers the entirety of the backside of the pack (clearly what it is intended to do) ...therefore, once you get everything stowed and the Y-strap (and side straps) cinched, your golden....but alas, if you need something "packed into one of the pouches, or internally compartment" you have to un-cinch everything. Accessibility to those auxiliary compartments is restrictive.
customer_reviews.author: Troy D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Dont fit my 6'3" - 220+ frame.
customer_reviews.text: Update to my original review. 5 stars for Customer service. Was right on top of it. Contacted me and made a more than fair deal to make me happy. Not made for large frames person. Shoulder straps barely come over my shoulders. Waist belt is in the middle of my belly. I do like the foil lined water bladder pouch and large capacity. Just not very likely to use it as is. Will probably strap it to a pack frame.
customer_reviews.author: troy kenworthy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 5’2 and 140lb female. This is also my very first tactical backpack that I’m going to use for my rucking meet up groups. My goal is to train for a backpacking trip. I’m just writing this review to show you what it looks like on. I don’t have much knowledge on these but will give an updated review after much use. Right now, all I can say is that it feels big and I have everything on the tightest it’ll go, as you can see with the extra material hanging lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this bag, you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! I've owned $30 Walmart specials as well as $300 Ospreys and the quality this bag well exceeds the price. Plenty of storage space. The insulated bladder pocket is awesome and keeps your body heat from warming up your water. It shipped fast (I do have prime) and the company has Excellent customer service as well! Highly recommend this bag, I'll probably end up getting another one for my girl in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P.

customer_reviews.title: Update: my bag has been replace and is better quality!!
customer_reviews.text: My bag has been replaced and the quality is so much better than it was before!! I am very happy with the amazing customer service with Jasmine . I purchased this bag because of its glorified heavy duty zipper and it’s dependability BUT since purchasing it the snaps have came off multiple times, now TWO zippers have broken making the bag unusable unless I want to drop everything out of it! There was a abundance amount of threads I had to trim off before even using! Very unsatisfied. But I guess it did hold shortly. I do not recommend this bag at all.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Professional backpack
customer_reviews.text: I use this bp for my medical supplies. im a member of a Law enforcement Search & Rescue team, I have not use it much in the few weeks ive had it but it is of good mil spec type quality. I would buy it again and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben There

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for longer hikes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack on 4/22/2020, I needed to upgrade to a larger hiking pack, the pack I had was too small for longer hikes. This pack was able to carry my wet weather gear, food, extra clothes, my DSLR camera with extra lens and many other items for a 20 miles hike in western NY. All of the zippers worked well and it rode well on my shoulders. After 20 miles I had no shoulder or waste bruising or chaffing. The water bladder was great there were no leaks and the large opening made it easy to refill when we had to stop for more water at a steam and use the filters.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gallatin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: When I purchases this pack I wasn’t expecting much because of the price but was I wrong. I use it for work and it has exceeded all my expectations. So many compartment and is really well made. I did appreciate the free patches that came with it. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jt will do

customer_reviews.title: Assembly and stitching should have been better
customer_reviews.text: Use the bag for carrying my lunch everyday the shoulder straps stitching started coming off the seam and the strap above the shoulder straps to cinch it more are sewn like no one had a care all messed up. The molle are not evenly sized have a hard time attaching extras to the bag have to use needle pliers to pull straps thru the molle besides that ok strong material and big bag holds enough stuff
customer_reviews.author: Rajeshram Sadhu

customer_reviews.title: not well made
customer_reviews.text: cheap construction. Missed stitches all over the place and some straps weren't even stitched at all. Plus it was much smaller than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Bill E.

customer_reviews.title: Used for hunting!
customer_reviews.text: Very great pack! A lot of pockets! I store All my survival and hunting stuff in this pack! It’s comfortably especially with clip in front and waist clip! 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a "bug out" bag. After reading ratings for other bags in this price range I'm happy with this purchase! It's well made with plenty of room to take your necessities. The padding in the back and strap area is a big plus as well as the insulated Hydration bottle compartment. A great pack for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chinookie

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for riding motorbikes through the forest on long rides where i carry up to a chainsaw in my backpack. Very well constructed and great size water bladder!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pack. Especially for the price. The layout is awesome. There are a lot of packs out there with this same layout (pockets and placement). Tons of room and pockets with usable storage. Great insulating back panel for hydro-bladder or a place to keep things from getting wet in a major rainstorm. Zippers feel durable and smooth. Very comfortable lap belt with great support.
customer_reviews.author: jerolyn young

customer_reviews.title: Your last backpack
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my backpack its so awesome. I take it on all my hikes and outdoor activities. So far I keep adding things to it to make an all around pack and haven't had any problems with size, storage or weight. It's my go to now for everything. Bladder that came with is good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy, has individual pockets to stay organized and sticking/zippers are promising. Spacious enough to hold gear needed but small enough to travel light.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby.
customer_reviews.text: The straps slide through very easily which is a pain when you loosen the straps to the end. Either I need to lose more weight or they should incorporate stops stitched in to prevent this. Took it hunting in thick woods and up hills and into a tree stand. Fairly comfortable. Pretty good quality. Update shoulder straps were not folded over and would slide off. Design flaw. Company seems very adamant about getting this right. So I am getting a refund of half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was great! I took in on a medical deployment for a race and I held all my gear and a days worth of clothes! I got a lot of compliments and others who asked where I purchased it. Great price just made this a fabulous deal. I read a lot of complaints about the bag being small and the zippers ripping or breaking. I am not a large person and the bag was a good size. I can see it being "small" for a bigger guy. The zippers I also had no issues with, and I crammed a bunch of stuff in every pouch and pocket it has.
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Strong but hot.
customer_reviews.text: So far its stood up to a week of backpacking in big bend. It just isnt as good at keeping the water insulated as it seems to imply. it says the pouch is insulated, but my body heat had it warm in an hour, and hot in two.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, who is enlisted in the military. Needed a rucksack and did ok. Wasn’t has thick of material as I would have liked. He mentioned that it tore out inside about a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: WLR75

customer_reviews.title: My review on this product
customer_reviews.text: I mean come on, it’s a great backpack! This bag has survived overseas already! This is a tough bag and I dig that there are so many compartments for your things, etc. I even like the camelback part in the back and that it keeps your liquids cold! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jtaylor2820

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2 days trip
customer_reviews.text: Used this backpack to hike Havasupai falls. It handled everything like a champ. A lot of customization, pockets and I loved the thermal sleeve for the camelback, keeping the water cold. Support is great on the shoulders and hips, you can really put a lot of gears if you pack well.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchyaz

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is for my husband but we both tried it on while packed and it really stays in place and is very comfortable even though really packed. I put my other backpack on after and it shifted with each step I took so I think I might get one of these for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought this for a hike actually. Loved that it included a water bladder already. This was the second one I bought actually. My brother liked mine so much he asked me to get him one too.
customer_reviews.author: NW Wolfgirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Pack
customer_reviews.text: Can you find a better pack? Sure. Without spending a wayyy bigger amount of money? Probably not. Comes with a bladder too? Cmon cant beat it
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this pack. I have no complaints and use it every single day for work.
customer_reviews.author: Roch G

customer_reviews.title: Colors are off. Different multicam pattern
customer_reviews.text: It kinda felt cheap and the colors were beyond off than what was expected. I literally opened it up and knew there was a problem. The colors looks pink and brown smh, not cool. I sent it back the same day
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he absolutely loves it. He uses it as a range bag, a carry - on when he travels for work, and when we go camping. It’s able to fit everything he needs and some of our kids things. He would recommend this backpack to anyone who is looking for a tactical style backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Mauk

customer_reviews.title: The materials and construction are of very good quality. I am very pleased with is purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've only loaded a small amount of gear into this Tactical Pack. Holds a lot. The materials and construction are of very good quality. I am very pleased with is purchase. Better than expected. eager to see how it holds up to actual use.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Not back breaking great distribution
customer_reviews.text: Great pack ! Durable so many pockets perfect for my hiking trips. It can fit a ton of stuff in there. Not back breaking distributed weight. Perfect !
customer_reviews.author: NewsLady

customer_reviews.title: the water bladder,and storage
customer_reviews.text: the shoulder straps have no stop someone forgot to see in the stop but all in all an awsomeme tac pack, plenty of storage very versital
customer_reviews.author: Bigd

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack with lots of pockets and lots of room and expands really well. the bladder keeps water cold for days.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best investment I have made for my boyfriend. We go traveling quite a bit and he uses this backpack for his motorcycle riding. It holds everything, even his camelpak which is the main reason we bought it. We travel at Disneyland and he brings this with the camelpak in it, which is very convinent.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking/ hunting
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack for both hunting and also hiking!! Tons of room!
customer_reviews.author: James Nale

customer_reviews.title: Check the zippers
customer_reviews.text: It has more zippers then the pictures show. Check them before you use it. That makes it a great product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little day pack. I use it while hunting and scouting. Gave three stars because the plastic belt clip broke with light tension. I'll replace it myself with with clips that aren't garbage.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH M LANE

customer_reviews.title: Great tatical Hydration pack
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 5 star because it's so comfy and fits everything I need. The Straps have plenty of length for larger persons. It came fast and works great, I have taken on two trips and so far so good. I will post later when I have some wear on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gmonieful

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tactical backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very functional. I've used it for travel and trail riding. The hydration pack is awesome! It is heavy when the pack is filled. But for a long trip outdoors, its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Manny Prime Zero

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied man!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband that works out at the mine. He said he’s really happy with it. Lots of compartments to store lots of different things, and a thermal section in the back! I would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: CupCake

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: From what I read I thought I was getting the bag with the water pack and also thought this bag had 3 Velcro patches . Guess not . Nice bag still for $30 though just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great! Fits all my stuff, great support, it just feels a bit smaller than in the pictures but fits very much everything, lots of pockets and organization space, the material feels ok great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great price point
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a well built pack for the price. I have been fairly tough on it durning hunting season and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This bag has a ton of room!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for what I use it for. Lots of room and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing hose to bladder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 17 yo nephew who specifically asked for it. When he opened it on Christmas morning he discovered that it did not come with the hose to be able to drink from, just the bladder. He is extremely disappointed since he will now have to purchase a hose and was unable to use the backpack on his quad trip the following day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels great, very pragmatic
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack with a cooler option and based on reviews went with this one. It feels solid and light even when filled due to the weight distribution, shoulder and waist straps. It looks cool! That is kind of a big bonus for me, I like to have the cool stuff and for the price this is pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Malia Gee

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I plan on using this as my hunting pack. It fits everything I need and more. I like the fact that it came with a bladder ( I purchased the black one). Can't wait to use it for hunting this year!
customer_reviews.author: Golden Millie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! Great for commuting and biking. Very responsive customer service if you run into any problem with the product. It is a better quality than many high priced backpacks out there.
customer_reviews.author: vk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, very spacious and many compartments to work with. Very handy in many ways. Light and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son use this for hiking and camping and he likes it and at the end of the day he said it did not hurt his back it’s still comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great bagpack especially for soldiers
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and sturdy bagpack. Great compartments and it holds a good amount of things. The straps makes loads easy for carrying. Exactly as in the pic
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Quality surpasses the price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great lots of space and zippered compartments. The durability only time will tell but for the price I don't think you can beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Packed my bag for bugging out and still had room. Holds alot of thing and cant wait to actually use it
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: It is way smaller in person.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bag for hunting and wound up with a way smaller bag than I originally thought.. Not an ideal bug-out bag nor is it ideal for outdoors. I would probably let my kids use it for school. If it fits all their books.
customer_reviews.author: SECU

customer_reviews.title: tore after less than a month...
customer_reviews.text: The bag design is fantastic, comfortable, lots of molle and pouches, HOWEVER - the side bag tore after less than a month - wrote to the AMAZON shop and they will send a new bag... so waiting, sadly i seei am not the only one even though their service is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Shaham

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good buy no problem at all! Really pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: saiful

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! My husband uses it on his fishing trips and camping so many compartments ! And Sturdy bag .
customer_reviews.author: lb

customer_reviews.title: Great value great product
customer_reviews.text: This bag is wonderful I absolutely love it I need another one
customer_reviews.author: Harun Darius Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine in today and it looks pretty good cant wait to try it out. I will be giving it a 4 stars because of appearance and first thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Pbjunky511

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag; bad strap
customer_reviews.text: My son really liked the bag, but the right arm strap ripped of the body of the bag. Didn't last as long as expected. (used for school)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He loves it! Very nice construction, material is sturdy. Lots of compartments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I look like a true soldier with that seriously it's not a ...
customer_reviews.text: I look like a true soldier with that seriously it's not a joke and many people in my class love my backpack and I told them. check it in amazon with rupumpack and you won't disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Glaphira Marcelin

customer_reviews.title: Does just what I wanted!!! Awesome pack!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds plenty! Seems very strong and has enough different compartments that you can set it up for easy access!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John J.  (Joe) Carey

customer_reviews.title: Great pack
customer_reviews.text: Love this pack. Only prob I have is it has so many options to stuff things into or hang off of that I over pack it. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product easy fits perfectly, great quality will buy another
customer_reviews.author: Carlos leal

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. I carry about 32 lbs in it and I get No shoulder or back pain.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: This bag has all the space you need and more for 3 days. Used it for hiking, travel and everything in between. Small pockets on the outside are perfect for items you need to get quickly or often. Durable material, and the molle makes adding additional bags easy. Great price for what it has to offer!
customer_reviews.author: FVB27

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack!!! I can't say it enough awesome material tons of storage space. And it really looks cool definitely my favorite thing I've bought on Amazon so far
customer_reviews.author: Juan Calderon jr

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than i thought but still happy
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought but I was just looking for day pack anyway. Still a lot of storage, light weight. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brennen

customer_reviews.title: Great company and great pack
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing pack for the price! It has a ton of space and alot of of possible uses. I use mine as a hiking/camping/72 hour bag. The only issue i had was the while i was sinching the shoulder straps down one of the buckles broke. However i cantacted Rupimpack and they are sending me a replacment free of charge. Great product and great customer service. Hoghly recommend getting this bag!
customer_reviews.author: timothy j smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hiking backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the price! Holds a ton of stuff and was perfect for our little family’s hiking adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covered in mold.
customer_reviews.text: This pack showed up quite smaller than expected and covered in moldy mildew spiderwebs... its made of good quality but like the packer didnt notice it was filthy? Cooler pack works great.
customer_reviews.author: JetPlane

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go and work jobsites
customer_reviews.text: Love the space of the pack and the cooler section stays cold. I use it as a lunch box! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty backpacks!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room for my 5th grader. Books and other misc stuff!
customer_reviews.author: ramir barbasina

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing tackle bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Makes a great fishing tackle bag. I cut some of the extra straps off as I don’t need them but overall it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My son’s back pack for jr high, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for .
customer_reviews.text: At first I was like yeah this not so bad , even after I read reviews about zippers an seams busting . Then about month , maybe 2 zipper on the main part separated. Update: Amazing customer service though, they reached out to me and they replaced the pack sending me new one.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag especially for the cost. Really like the ability to have the camel pack
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good!
customer_reviews.text: Love it but I had to make some adjustments to it so it could be more user friendly. It’s made more for hiking and long distance travel vs just day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Fave backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: It has plenty of space when you need it, collapsible when you don't. It's very sturdy, I like the materials it made from. The water bladder is great to have and it fits well. Definitely my favorite backpack of all I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Soliman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: bit small for an adult male, I'm 190,fit, and 5'8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great backpack for the price
customer_reviews.text: there is so much room in this backpack its incredible plus i feel you could put more than 2.5l of liquids in the hydration pouch
customer_reviews.author: nicholas r.

customer_reviews.title: they are cool
customer_reviews.text: its a backpack if its ur style go for it
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets and Compact. Extra wide Hip belt sets this apart.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real person here who bought this and love it worked perfect would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Very roomy and just keeps expanding. Keeps laptop and other things safe.
customer_reviews.author: Nadeem Kasmani

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day. The water pouch is extremely convenient and I always have room for all of my stuff. It's not too heavy especially with the waist and chest straps though some of the other straps come loose a bit too easily. 9/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Matan M.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of straps and features.
customer_reviews.text: Compact bag with multiple storage compartments. Good look and feel. Above average materials and webbing.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Steenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking backpack. It smaller than what the picture shows
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, still am using it everyday months later and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pack
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot. Quiet durable. Insulated pouch kept the water cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap connector broke bag inoperable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of the pack for big out bags. The shoulder strap broke making the bag inoperable. Extremely poor quality on the zippers and strap cinches.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan McGinn

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be a little bigger but I still like it. The molle webbing on the sides is a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

product_meta.title: RUPUMPACK Military Tactical Backpack Hydration Backpacks Army MOLLE Bag 3 Day Rucksack Outdoor Hiking School Daypack 33L
feature_bullets: HYDRATION INSULATION LAYER : With a hydration insulation layer which works great for 2.5L hydration bladder ( bladder is not included) and keeps liquid cool up to 4 hours as a hydration backpack or portable cooler for outdoor, camping and hiking.

VERSATILE WITH MULTI-COMPARTMENT: With two extra pockets on the wide waist straps you can put iphone plus 7 in and take it out freely. This pack has multi-compartment and zippered closure pockets including interior zip pocket and mesh pocket for added storage options to meet your demands in daily life and outdoor camping.

CAPACITY: Tactical military backpack size approx.:10.5"*18.5"*11" (W*H*D). Capacity approx. 33 L. It's a small 3-day bug out bag, assault pack, hunting backpack, survival backpack, or rucksack for outdoors.

DURABLE AND COMFORTABLE TO USE: This tactical pack is reliable and durable due to its high density water-resistant fabric material, double-stitches, heavy duty zippers and safety reflectors on the shoulder straps. It is also comfortable to use with its ventilated mesh padding in the back area and shoulder straps.

MOLLE SYSTEM: The MOLLE system of RUPUMPACK is designed for convenient combination with other equipments. It’s a little different from most tactical packs as the spacing between MOLLE is less than 1/2".
